caption.p: A-F: Potential habitat suitability model ensemble (maximum value of 10) using the one percentile threshold for fountain grass ( Pennisetum setaceum) (A,C,E) and goutweed ( Aegopodium podagraria) (B,D,F) at each extent: national extent (A, B), regional extent defined by the Exotic Plant Management Team Regions including C) Lake Mead and D) Great Lakes), and the local extent defined by E) Joshua Tree National Park and F) Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.
